channel.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
channel.description: I hit up the system requirements thread and hit up the "Can you run it?" site. I was struck to see my processor readout for The Orange Box and looking for some clarification. [quote] You Have: 2.08 GHz Performance Rated at: 2.808 GHz [/quote] Is it performing like a 2.8 GHz processor, or is that what it [i]could[/i] run at?

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: PycleNem73
item.description:
Orange Box is like the only game I will never trade out for Xbox. Best deal ever.

Read full topic

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
sersoft:

The “Performance Rated” ghz is the amount of ghz it would be if it was a netburst (Pentium 4) processor.

unofficially yes, but officially it is related to an AMD CPU-Series

Read full topic

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
The “Performance Rated” ghz is the amount of ghz it would be if it was a netburst (Pentium 4) processor.

You Have: 2.93 GHz Performance Rated at: 5.1275 GHz

Read full topic

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: Karriz
item.description:
My 2,4ghz single core is rated over 3ghz. Strange, no idea why it does that.

Meh, I was just guessing.

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
I have an AMD Athlon 64 3000+ at the moment and that one is definately singe-core but systemrequiremens still says this: 1.96 GHz Performance Rated at: 3.528 GHz.
I really don’t get it.

Read full topic

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
You Have: 3.09 GHz Performance Rated at: 8.4975 GHz

Looks like it accounts to multicore processors. You might have a dual core system, so that would mean it’s performance would be ‘equivalent’ to one of a 2.808 ghz single core processor. This isn’t exact, but gives you an idea of if your system can run it.

The number is what it is currently running at.

Read full topic

item.title: The Orange Box [Benchmarks]
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
I hit up the system requirements thread and hit up the “Can you run it?” site. I was struck to see my processor readout for The Orange Box and looking for some clarification.

You Have: 2.08 GHz Performance Rated at: 2.808 GHz

Is it performing like a 2.8 GHz processor, or is that what it could run at?

Read full topic
